Company: Office of Dr. Leslie Coleman, Staff Providers
Description of incident: A temporary employee from Staff Providers misused patient information.  The temporary employee took co-payments from patients while the manager was out of the office. The temporary employee did not have authorization to collect the financial information and made print copies of each customer's credit card during transactions.  Patients later called the medical office and complained about fraudulent charges.  The temporary employee made at least $1,400 worth of fraudulent charges, but was caught and charged with 11 counts of third-degree identity theft, illegal use of a credit card, and sixth-degree larceny almost immediately.
